abstract: Communications software maker Nuance has agreed to buy Swype for $102.5 million, according to a filing submitted on Friday. Swype, which makes text software for mobile devices, had previously raised financing from several investors, including the venture arms of Nokia and Samsung.

Swype, which makes text software for mobile devices, had previously raised financing from several investors, including the venture arms of Nokia and Samsung. Read more »
